PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-04202011-03-18,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HRSDC
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS, in order to provide the Canada Employment Insurance Commission with the authority to ratify the amounts paid to certain claimants of employment insurance special benefits after the end of the benefit period that they should have received as a result of the misapplication of the amendments to section 10 of the Employment Insurance Act contained in Bill C-50.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0075 Publication Date: 2011-03-30
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS, in order to provide the Canada Employment Insurance Commission with the authority to ratify the amounts paid to certain claimants of employment insurance special benefits after the end of the benefit period that they should have received as a result of the misapplication of the amendments to section 10 of the Employment Insurance Act contained in Bill C-50.
